dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: Hey, Vincent, how did you do on the recent test score?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Oh, it was okay. I improved in math, but I need to work more on History.

dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: Really? I heard you did exceptionally well in math. How did you study?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I've been reviewing with Yvonne. We help each other out, especially with the tough problems.

dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: Sounds good. I think I need a study partner too. Do you think Yvonne would be willing to help me?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Sure, you can ask her. Yvonne is very diligent, I think she'd be happy to help.
